name: The Kingly Tales: Come To America!
name_original: The Kingly Tales: Come To America!
description: It's King's 21st birthday! Let's break out the cake, the ice cream, the pizza, and... the Illuminati? That's right! Help King travel from his hometown of Freedom, Maine to defeat the Illuminati before they make a literal hell on earth! With the help of Melody, Baron, and Leonidas; the leader of the Illuminati and self proclaimed queen of the world, Janine Ch'tea Consteria doesn't stand a chance!
